error.message: Call to deprecated function system_get_info(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('extension.list.$type')->getExtensionInfo() or \Drupal::service('extension.list.$type')->getAllInstalledInfo() instead.
Call to deprecated function file_default_scheme(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::config('system.file')->get('default_scheme') instead.
